w :  it ' s exciting just to think about it .  it will be my first trip to italy  but i may have trouble finding my way around when i ' m there .
m :  don ' t worry about that .  just give me a call when you arrive .  i ' ll show you the way around .

question: what does the man offer to do for the woman ?
choice: he will go to the airport to meet the woman .
he will reserve a hotel room for the woman .
he will help her find her way around .
answer: he will help her find her way around .
